name: Overall Performance
query: SELECT results.participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(inner_res.summary.mean_reward, 2) AS "Mean Reward", ROUND(inner_res.summary.safe_response_rate * 100, 1) AS "Safe %", ROUND(inner_res.summary.medical_hallucination_rate * 100, 1) AS "Hallucination %" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(outer_res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(outer_res.results) AS ir(inner_res) ORDER BY "Mean Reward" DESC

name: Safety Breakdown
query: SELECT results.participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(inner_res.summary.reasoning_consistency_rate * 100, 1) AS "Consistency %", ROUND(inner_res.summary.refusal_rate * 100, 1) AS "Refusal %", inner_res.summary.total_responses AS "Samples" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(outer_res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(outer_res.results) AS ir(inner_res) ORDER BY "Consistency %" DESC

name: Reward Distribution
query: SELECT results.participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(inner_res.summary.min_reward, 1) AS "Min", ROUND(inner_res.summary.median_reward, 1) AS "Median", ROUND(inner_res.summary.max_reward, 1) AS "Max", ROUND(inner_res.summary.std_reward, 2) AS "Std Dev" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(outer_res) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(outer_res.results) AS ir(inner_res) ORDER BY "Median" DESC
